price: Dhugumatti, galmeen toltuu hojjattootaa Illiyyiin keessatti ta'aadha.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
